question.title: Gradle run/build issue while trying to run an android app
question.body:
Could not run phased build action using connection to Gradle distribution 'https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.6-all.zip'. java.lang.RuntimeException: org.gradle.api.internal.catalog.GeneratedClassCompilationException: No Java compiler found, please ensure you are running Gradle with a JDK org.gradle.api.internal.catalog.GeneratedClassCompilationException: No Java compiler found, please ensure you are running Gradle with a JDK No Java compiler found, please ensure you are running Gradle with a JDK

Error code i'm getting, I'm not sure what the problem is. I've set the JAVA_HOME path and path to jdk 22 and it still won't build.
